ygData.subject: Re: Plea for help-
ygData.msgSnippet: Party with a cleric(or someone who can heal you). If you cannot find a cleric, fight blue monsters. You should not need any more people in your party. If you
ygData.messageBody:
Party with a cleric(or someone who can heal you). If you cannot find a
cleric, fight blue monsters. You should not need any more people in your
party. If you want to do battle with yellow creatures, find another monk of
the same level. This strategy should get you through the early teens. Beyond
that, you'll want to start looking for a larger party.

Grog

I can only help one person at a time.
Today is not your day.
Tomorrow does not look good either.

> I am a level 8 monk on the Xegony server and I need some guidance, I
>have been level 8 for what seems like an eternity and I have a LOT of
>trouble killing most things that con as an even fight. I would like some
>guidance and some tips for some better ways to get to level 17 faster from
>a higher level monk, and possibly if one is on the Xegony server is
>willing to help me in game, i will be very grateful.
